plugin.name: wstroke
plugin._long: A plugin to identify complex gestures drawn by the mouse and associate them with actions.

option.name: initiate
option._long: Mouse button to press for drawing a gesture.

option.name: stroke_color
option._long: Sets the line color for the strokes drawn.

option.name: stroke_width
option._long: Sets the line width for drawing strokes (in pixels).

option.name: target_view_mouse
option._short: Target the view under the mouse
option._long: If set, the target of the gesture action is the view under the pointer when the gesture is initiated. Otherwise, it is the currently active view.

option.name: focus_mode
option._short: Focus the view under the mouse
option._long: Specifies if the view under the mouse should be focused.

option.name: start_timeout
option._long: Timeout after a right click to start a stroke. Can be used to generate strokes on touchpads.

option.name: end_timeout
option._long: Use this timeout for ending gestures if they were started with the previous timeout.
